guia.usos: >@<|mention a user, >ID<|ID of a user, >num_pagina<|the rank page
guia.funcao: The member's level ranking on the server, active members have more experience and therefore are more prominent in the ranking; sometimes the rating can grant up to 5x XP for each message
Confirm whether a user is cattle or not

guia.usos: >@< >@<|mencione duas pessoas, >ID< >ID< use o ID de duas pessoas
guia.funcao: Mostra o nível de afinidade entre duas pessoas
Envia uma saudação ao baidu no chat

guia.usos: eight and seven|makes alonsal say "eight-seven" with TTS in the chat, >FILE<|re-sends the file sent by the user
guia.funcao: Alonsal will speak in TTS or send files with this command
Alonsal will tell a random curiosity (only in Portuguese)
Alonsal will tell a random joke (only in Portuguese)
It will make your text stylish
See your ping and Alonsal's ping

guia.usos: >your_text<|Code your text in morse, >your_morse<|Decode your text from morse
guia.funcao: Encode and decode whatever you want to/from Morse
